solution_line_template: First find the total amount of time he spends trying to get off the freeway: {traffic_wait_hours} hours * {multiplier_freeway} = <<{traffic_wait_hours}*{multiplier_freeway}={freeway_exit_time}>>{freeway_exit_time} hours

Then add the time he spends waiting in traffic to find the total time: {freeway_exit_time} hours + {traffic_wait_hours} hours = <<{freeway_exit_time}+{traffic_wait_hours}={total_waste_time}>>{total_waste_time} hours
